intro.str: Somewhere in the dark mazes beneath the temple of Tithonus
A lost nymph seeks the way back to the world of daylight
But anyone who wants to leave this cursed place must pay a price
Precious stygian obols might buy the desired freedom
Or lead young nymph to its eventual demise...

outro.str: You've collected enough stygian obols to pay a toll
Cast away your imperfect form, little nymph
You may leave the cursed temple of Tithonus now
Your real journey has just begun...

ui.str: Powered by Construct 2 Muzt Die Studios, Ukraine, L'viv, 2019
